General.Name: Gentor Resources Inc
General.Description: Gentor Resources Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, the company was engaged in the exploration and evaluation of the Karaburun project located in the Boyabat area of northern Turkey. It intends to evaluate new business opportunities. Gentor Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 1 First Canadian Place, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1E3
